title: CarvanaX : Car Marketplace
description: Developed a car marketplace platform with secure user authentication using JWT and social logins, enabling users to manage their accounts seamlessly. Implemented features for adding, editing, and deleting car listings, with category-based filtering for an improved browsing experience. Integrated advanced search, direct messaging between users and car owners, and a financial calculator to estimate payment plans easily.

title: localBazaa₹ : Full Stack eCommerce App
description: localBazaa₹ is a mobile-friendly eCommerce platform with JWT-based authentication, allowing users to securely log in and manage their accounts. It includes a forgot password feature that sends an OTP to the user's email for password recovery. Users can search products, add them to the cart, and complete orders through a payment gateway. The admin dashboard enables full CRUD operations for managing categories, subcategories, and products.

title: PaisaWaisa: Expense Tracker
description: Developed an expense tracker application with secure user authentication, including sign-up, login/logout, and protected routes for data privacy. Implemented functionality to add, update,and manage income and expense transactions efficiently. Visualized financial data through interactive charts and enabled users to download detailed reports for future reference.
